gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Copernicus Dataset from TanDEM-X with Filename: DEM1_SAR_DGE_30_20110327T173308_20130522T172643_ADS_000000_iT53.DEM.tar

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
The product original source is the TanDEM-X mission and has been produced by DLR e.V. (Distribution Airbus Defence and Space GmbH).
This product has been originally provided in the context of the Copernicus Space Component. Further details on the Copernicus Space Component, and in particular the Data Access System, are available at https://spacedata.copernicus.eu.
This Copernicus DEM Digital Surface Model has been acquired by X-Band SAR sensors and processed using interferometry and calibration/mosaicking techniques. The mosaicked, raw data was edited to the WorldDEM base product, and then postprocessed to Copernicus DEM product. It has a resolution of 1.0 arcseconds.

gmd:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: Percentage of invalid height information (value - 32,767) in relation to the total number of pixels of the complete dataset

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString:
Copernicus DEM processing steps:
1) bistatic StripMap acquisition using the TerraSAR-X and TanDEM-X satellite
2) Interferometric processing to rawDEM scene
3) Calibration and Mosaicking of rawDEM scenes to global DEM
4) Terrain editing and hydrological editing to WorldDEM
5) Resampling and formatting to Copernicus DEM instances
